record.field: Operational risk is the risk of loss as a result of ineffective or failed internal processes, people, systems, or external events which can disrupt the flow of business operations.
Technology risk is any potential for technology failures to disrupt your business such as information security incidents or service outages.

Financial risk refers to the likelihood of losing money on a business or investment decision. Risks associated with finances can result in capital losses for individuals and businesses. There are several financial risks, such as credit, liquidity, and operational risks.
